column1: #text=I wanted to take a train trip to New York City to visit my sister .
#text=I went to the Amtrak station in Boston and found the ticket office .
#text=As I stood in line , I looked at the board showing all the departure times to New York .
#text=Lucky for me , there was a train leaving in half an hour .
#text=I made my way to the front of the line and asked to buy a ticket for that train .
#text=I paid , then made my way to the platform for my train .
#text=The train was already there , so I looked on my ticket for my train car and seat number , then hopped aboard .
#text=I took out my novel and started reading , only interrupted by the conductor coming to check my ticket .
#text=Before I knew it , we were pulling into the station in New York .
